description: Police are investigating but it's thought the driver had a seizure and blacked out, his partner says.
title: Isle of Man bin lorry crash driver 'suffered seizure' at the wheel
title_page: Isle of Man bin lorry crash driver 'suffered seizure' at the wheel - BBC News
maintext: A spokesman for the Isle of Man Constabulary confirmed there were no other vehicles involved and the driver had been alone in the lorry at the time of the collision.
